mapper.select: SELECT distinct trim(keyword) FROM places_tb where 1 = 1 and keyword like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' group by keyword
select parent_area, area, area_name from area_tb where del_flag != 'Y' order by parent_area, area
select area, area_name from area_tb where parent_area = '*' and del_flag != 'Y' order by area
select area, area_name from area_tb where parent_area = #{area} and del_flag != 'Y'
select B.area_name || ' ' || A.area_name as area from area_tb as A join area_tb as B on A.parent_area = B.area where A.del_flag != 'Y' and A.area != '000'
select count(*) from main_tb where 1 = 1 and del_flag != 'Y' and link = #{link} and keyword = #{keyword}
mapper.insert: insert into main_tb ( portal, author, title, description, thumbnail, link, published_date, add_date, add_time, start_index, keyword ) values ( #{portal}, #{author}, #{title}, #{description}, #{thumbnail}, #{link}, #{published_date}::date, current_date, current_time, #{start_index}, #{keyword} )
mapper.select:
select * from main_tb where 1 = 1 and del_flag != 'Y' and portal = #{portal} and keyword = #{query} order by random()
limit #{size}::int
select count(*) from main_tb where 1 = 1 and del_flag != 'Y' and portal = #{portal} and keyword = #{query}

select distinct bookmark.place_id, bookmark.gubun, place.place_name, review.review_id, review.write_date, review.y_title, review.y_description, review.y_video_id, review.y_thumbnail_url from bookmark_tb bookmark join places_tb place on bookmark.place_id = place.place_id and place.delete_flag != 'Y' join portal_review_tb review on bookmark.id = review.review_id and review.del_flag != 'Y' where 1 = 1 and bookmark.user_id = #{user_id} and bookmark.sns_division = #{sns_division} and bookmark.gubun = #{gubun} and bookmark.del_flag != 'Y'

select distinct bookmark.place_id, bookmark.gubun, place.place_name, review.review_id, review.write_date, review.author, review.url, review.title, review.description, review.thumbnail_url from bookmark_tb bookmark join places_tb place on bookmark.place_id = place.place_id and place.delete_flag != 'Y' join portal_blog_tb review on bookmark.id = review.review_id and review.del_flag != 'Y' where 1 = 1 and bookmark.user_id = #{user_id} and bookmark.sns_division = #{sns_division} and bookmark.gubun = #{gubun} and bookmark.del_flag != 'Y'

select distinct bookmark.place_id, bookmark.gubun, place.place_name, review.review_id, review.review_contents, review.review_user_id, getappreviewlikecount(review.review_id) as like_count, getappreviewlikeflag(review.review_id, #{user_id}, #{sns_division}) as like_flag, review.rating_point, review.add_date, review.add_time from bookmark_tb bookmark join places_tb place on bookmark.place_id = place.place_id and place.delete_flag != 'Y' join app_review_tb review on bookmark.id = review.review_id and review.del_flag != 'Y' where 1 = 1 and bookmark.user_id = #{user_id} and bookmark.sns_division = #{sns_division} and bookmark.gubun = #{gubun} and bookmark.del_flag != 'Y'

select distinct bookmark.place_id, bookmark.gubun, place.place_name, place.open_hours, place.category, avgReviewRating(bookmark.place_id) as rating_point, getthumbnail(bookmark.place_id) as thumbnail from bookmark_tb bookmark join places_tb place on bookmark.place_id = place.place_id and place.delete_flag != 'Y' where 1 = 1 and bookmark.user_id = #{user_id} and bookmark.sns_division = #{sns_division} and bookmark.gubun = #{gubun} and bookmark.del_flag != 'Y'
mapper.insert: insert into bookmark_tb (place_id, add_user_id, add_time, add_date, del_flag, gubun, user_id, id, sns_division) values( #{place_id}, #{user_id}, current_time, current_date, 'N', #{gubun}, #{user_id}, #{id}, #{sns_division});

insert into bookmark_tb (place_id, add_user_id, add_time, add_date, del_flag, gubun, user_id, sns_division) values( #{place_id}, #{user_id}, current_time, current_date, 'N', #{gubun}, #{user_id}, #{sns_division});
mapper.select: select count(*) as count from places_tb where 1 = 1 and keyword = #{keyword} and delete_flag != 'Y'

select place_id, place_name, open_hours, place.category, category_table.category_name, latitude, longitude, place_address , road_place_address , (select trunc(avg(g_rating),1) from portal_review_tb where portal = 'G' and place_id = place.place_id and del_flag != 'Y') as google_rating, avgreviewrating(place_id) as app_review_rating, (select thumbnail_url from portal_blog_tb where place_id = place.place_id and portal = 'DAUM' limit 1) as blog_thumbnail, getthumbnail(place.place_id ) as app_thumbnail from places_tb place left join category_tb category_table on place.category = category_table.category where 1 = 1 and keyword = #{keyword} and delete_flag != 'Y'
order by random() limit #{size}::int
